moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze adjacent Pokemon.
moves.name: Discharge

moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.name: Shock Wave

moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
moves.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.
moves.name: Laser Focus

moves.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.
moves.name: Attract

ability.shortDesc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.
ability.name: Static

moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.
moves.name: Swift

moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)
moves.name: Secret Power

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.
moves.name: Charm

moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.
moves.name: Work Up

ability.desc: If a Pokemon uses a Fire- or Ice-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's attacking stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.
ability.shortDesc: Fire/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved attacking stat.
ability.name: Thick Fat

moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.
moves.name: Swift

moves.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.
moves.name: Knock Off

moves.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.
moves.name: Surf

moves.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.
moves.name: Swagger

moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.
moves.name: Razor Leaf

moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
moves.name: Energy Ball

moves.desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and does not ignore type immunity.
moves.shortDesc: Waits 2 turns; deals double the damage taken.
moves.name: Bide

moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.
moves.name: Sunny Day

ability.desc: If Sunny Day is active and this Pokemon is not holding Utility Umbrella, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
ability.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
ability.name: Chlorophyll

moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 1/4 recoil.
moves.name: Wild Charge

moves.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.
moves.name: Attract

moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
moves.name: Focus Blast

moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
moves.name: Protect

ability.shortDesc: If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
ability.name: Surge Surfer

moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.
moves.name: Spacial Rend

moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance lower adjacent Pkmn Speed by 1.
moves.name: Bulldoze

moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.
moves.name: Hone Claws

moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 2.
moves.name: Swords Dance

ability.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate or Z-Crystal.
ability.name: Multitype
